content.question: The diagram above represents a typical rod-shaped bacterium. Which of the following best describes a feature shown in the diagram that is unique to archaea and bacteria?

choices.label: The organism is surrounded by a cell wall.
The organism does not have a nuclear membrane surrounding its genetic material.
The organism is not capable of making or providing itself with ATP.

content.answer: The organism does not have a nuclear membrane surrounding its genetic material.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
